dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1693 IH: White House Accountability Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Ellmers of North Carolina introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Appropriations

form.official-title: To rescind unobligated amounts for White House salaries and expenses.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the White House Accountability Act of 2015.

paragraph.text: That the President has failed to fulfill his duty to enforce immigration law.
That our national security is the primary responsibility of the United States Federal Government.
That it stands to reason that when you do not fulfill your responsibilities, you typically lose your compensation.

section.text: Of the funds made available for fiscal year 2015 for The White Houseâ€”Salaries and Expenses, the unobligated balance is rescinded.
